name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

lessons.name: Thrust Calculation
lessons.description: Methods and formulas for calculating thrust in different rocket engines.

lessons.name: Rocket Propellant Types
lessons.description: Examination of different propellant types used in rocket propulsion.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

lessons.name: Propellant Handling and Storage
lessons.description: Safety measures and techniques for handling and storing rocket propellants.

lessons.name: Fuel Efficiency Optimization
lessons.description: Techniques for optimizing fuel efficiency in rocket engines.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

lessons.name: Nozzle Material Selection
lessons.description: Criteria for selecting materials for rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: 3D Printing in Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Application of 3D printing technology in the design and manufacturing of rocket nozzles.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Airfoil Design
lessons.description: Basics of designing airfoils for different aerodynamic applications.

lessons.name: Boundary Layer Theory
lessons.description: Understanding boundary layer behavior and its impact on aerodynamic performance.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Shock Waves
lessons.description: Formation and impact of shock waves in supersonic flow.

lessons.name: Flow Visualization Techniques
lessons.description: Techniques for visualizing and studying subsonic and supersonic flows.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Thermal Protection Systems
lessons.description: Different types of thermal protection systems used in aerospace applications.

lessons.name: Hypersonic Flow
lessons.description: Characteristics and challenges of hypersonic flow and associated heating.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Structural Load Analysis
lessons.description: Methods for analyzing and calculating structural loads on spacecraft.

lessons.name: Material Fatigue and Durability
lessons.description: Understanding material fatigue and durability in spacecraft structures.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Orbital Transfer Maneuvers
lessons.description: Techniques for performing orbital transfer maneuvers.

lessons.name: Gravity Assist
lessons.description: Understanding and applying gravity assist techniques for mission planning.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: System Integration
lessons.description: Techniques for integrating different systems and subsystems in spacecraft design.

lessons.name: Risk Management in Spacecraft Design
lessons.description: Approaches to identifying and managing risks in spacecraft systems engineering.
